<small>Also see: **<big>[[H3417|יָרָק]]</big>**</small>

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָקַק‎</span>] **verb** ==spit== (Late Hebrew, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְקַק‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all = Biblical Hebrew); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֹק‎</span> [[Lev.15.8|Lev 15:8]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of person spit upon. — compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרִק‎</span>.
